AboutUs.message1: We are a family-owned company with years of experience in passenger transportation. Our mission is to ensure comfort and satisfaction for every traveler.
AboutUs.message2: Behind us are years of dedicated work and thousands of happy customers who trust us!

Services.message1: Looking for a reliable taxi, airport transfer, or the perfect excursion? You’re in the right place!
Services.descriptionTrans: Reliable transfers for every occasion. We provide comfortable transportation to airports in the region and abroad.
Services.descriptionEks: Discover exciting excursions along the Istrian Riviera. Treat yourself and your loved ones to an unforgettable experience.
Services.descriptionBike: Bike transport to your desired location – perfect for cycling enthusiasts and sports clubs. Embark on your adventure!

Transfers.title: transfers
Transfers.firstParagraph: Need reliable transportation to the airport or a professional business transfer? Taxi Poreč City takes care of all your needs.
Transfers.secondaParagprah: Enjoy the comfort of our impeccably maintained vehicles and let our friendly staff make every journey a pleasant experience.

Excursions.title: excursions
Excursions.firstParagraph: Discover the charms of Istria with unforgettable excursions from Poreč City Taxi.
Excursions.secondaParagprah: Want to explore sunny Kamenjak, walk the walls of Motovun, or uncover the hidden treasures of the region? Contact us with confidence and book your perfect excursion today!

BikeTaxi.firstParagraph: Are you a passionate cycling enthusiast? Looking for transportation that supports your adventure?
BikeTaxi.secondaParagprah: Let us handle the transport of your bikes, so you can focus on enjoying a carefree ride through the enchanting Istrian landscapes.
